article:
I have a good friend from Australia. Her name is Laura. Here is a photo of her family.
There is a nice girl and a _ boy in the photo. The boy is her brother David. Laura is thirteen _ David is ten. _ do they look like? Laura is not fat and she is not thin _ . She is of medium build. She has a round _ like an apple. Her mouth is small, but her eyes are big. Her hair is _ and blonde. Laura likes purple and she is often in purple clothes. She dreams of being a singer. What about David? He is a little thin. David doesn't like _ . His favorite color is green. David wants to be an actor. They like _ movies very much. They often go to the cinema when they are free. It's relaxing for _ to see a movie. You can also see a black dog in the photo. It's their pet dog Cici.
